info.description: This is the API used by the Immotep application.
info.title: Immotep API

post.description: Answer an invite from an owner with an invite link by creating a new user with tenant role
Create a new user with owner role
Authenticate user with email and password
Create a contact message to a lease

400.description: Missing fields or bad base64 string

get.description: Get properties information of an owner, optionally filtered by archive status

post.description: Create a new property for an owner

get.description: Get property information by its ID

parameters.description: ONLY FOR OWNER: optional Lease ID (default: current)
parameters.name: lease_id

put.description: Update property information by its ID
Toggle archive status of a property by its ID

get.description: Get all damages of a property, optionally filtered by fixed status
Get all inventory reports for a property
get.summary: Get all inventory reports for a property

get.description: Get inventory report information by its ID or get the latest one

parameters.description: Report ID or 'latest' to get the latest one
parameters.name: report_id

get.description: Get property information by its ID with inventory including rooms and furnitures

parameters.description: ONLY FOR OWNER: optional Lease ID (default: current)
parameters.name: lease_id

get.description: Get all leases (active and inactive) for a property
Get lease by ID or current active lease
Get all damages of a lease, optionally filtered by fixed status
Get a damage

put.description: Update damage on owner side. Owner can only update the read status and the fix planned date.
Fix a damage for a tenant or owner. When both users have fixed the damage, it will be marked as fixed.

get.description: Get all documents of a lease related to a property

post.description: Upload a document to a lease

get.description: Get a document by its ID

delete.description: Delete a document by its ID

put.description: End active lease for a property

get.description: Get all inventory reports for a lease
get.summary: Get all inventory reports for a lease

post.description: Create a new inventory report for a room
Generate comparison from photo for last inventory report

parameters.description: Previous report ID to compare with
parameters.name: old_report_id

404.description: Property or old report not found

post.description: Generate summary from photo for first inventory report

get.description: Get inventory report information by its ID or get the latest one

parameters.description: Report ID or 'latest' to get the latest one
parameters.name: report_id

get.description: Get property's picture

parameters.description: Picture data as a Base64 string
parameters.name: picture

400.description: Missing fields or bad base64 string

get.description: Get all rooms for a specific property, optionally filtered by archive status

post.description: Create a new room for a property

get.description: Get room information by its ID

delete.description: Delete a room by its ID

put.description: Toggle archive status of a room by its ID

get.description: Get all furnitures for a specific room, optionally filtered by archive status

post.description: Create a new furniture for a room

get.description: Get furniture information by its ID

delete.description: Delete a furniture by its ID

put.description: Toggle archive status of a furniture by its ID

409.description: Invite already exists for this email

get.description: Get current user profile
Get current user's profile picture

parameters.description: Picture data as a Base64 string
parameters.name: picture

400.description: Missing fields or bad base64 string

post.description: Answer an invite from an owner with an invite link by accepting the invite

409.description: Property not available or tenant already has lease

get.description: Get all leases (active and inactive) for a tenant
Get lease by ID or current active lease
Get all damages of a lease, optionally filtered by fixed status

post.description: Create a damage to a lease

400.description: Missing fields or bad base64 string

get.description: Get a damage

put.description: Update damage on tenant side. Tenant can only update comment, priority and add new pictures.
Fix a damage for a tenant or owner. When both users have fixed the damage, it will be marked as fixed.

get.description: Get all documents of a lease related to a property

post.description: Upload a document to a lease

get.description: Get a document by its ID
Get all inventory reports for a lease

parameters.description: Report ID or 'latest' to get the latest one
parameters.name: report_id

get.description: Get property information by its ID

parameters.description: ONLY FOR OWNER: optional Lease ID (default: current)
parameters.name: lease_id

parameters.description: ONLY FOR OWNER: optional Lease ID (default: current)
parameters.name: lease_id

Get all rooms for a specific property, optionally filtered by archive status
Get room information by its ID
Get all users information
Get user information by its ID
Get user's picture

Bearer.description: Enter the token with the `Bearer ` prefix, e.g. "Bearer abcde12345".
Bearer.name: Authorization
